short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changes instances of 'Donald Trump' to 'Individual-1. 
 Source code can be found at https://github.com/nldoty/individual1

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome-extension that will replace multiple instances of "Donald Trump" with the name "Individual-1", which references an unnamed individual central to the investigation by Robert Mueller.
